snippet: Executives of some of the world’s largest companies said on the sidelines of the Paris climate talks that they would work to reduce emissions blamed for global warming.
lead_paragraph: Executives of some of the world’s largest companies said on the sidelines of the Paris climate talks that they would work to reduce emissions blamed for global warming.

headline.main: Business Leaders Commit to Energy Goals at Climate Conference
